Torvald pleads with her to stay, but Nora is resolute, returning her wedding ring and keys, and walking out the door, leaving Torvald devastated and alone.

Back in England, Crusoe finds his family mostly gone and his fortune uncertain. He travels to Lisbon, discovers his Brazilian plantation has prospered, and becomes wealthy. Aronnax, reflecting on his incredible journey, wonders if Nemo still roams the seas, and hopes that he will one day find peace.
